key.name: whitelisted-plugins
key.summary: List of plugins that are allowed to be loaded
key.description: A list of strings representing the plugins that are allowed to be loaded (default: “all”). This is only evaluated on startup.

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in unity-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: active
key.summary: Activation of this plugin
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by unity-settings-daemon or not
